product_name: Overland Equipment Montecito Duffel Bag - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With two roomy main compartments that fit shoes, gym gear and travel necessities, the Overland Equipment Montecito duffel bag is your perfect companion for trips to the gym or weekend getaways. Montecito duffel bag features one main compartment for gear, and a separate, slightly smaller main compartment that perfectly fits a pair of shoes; each compartment zips shut. Tough, durable nylon can stand up to heavy use; center handles and adjustable shoulder strap provide comfortable carry options; rolled up yoga mat fits between bag and handles. Overland Equipment Montecito duffel bag has 2 end pockets to hold water bottles, snacks or other small items. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline). Closeout.
short_description: With two roomy main compartments that fit shoes, gym gear and travel necessities, the Overland Equipment Montecito duffel bag is your perfect companion for trips to the gym or weekend getaways.
